tools.name: search-coffee-shops
tools.description: Find specialty coffee shops in Singapore with optional filters

vibe.description: Filter by vibe (e.g., Cozy, Minimalist, Japanese)

neighborhood.description: Filter by neighborhood (e.g., Tiong Bahru, Haji Lane)

tools.name: get-shop-details
tools.description: View detailed information about a specific coffee shop

tools.name: explore-all-shops
tools.description: View all specialty coffee shops in Singapore on an interactive map
